voicelines.text: Submarine has arrived. Please stand at a minimum of 5 studs away from the hatch until it's fully opened.
Please step back from the hatch.
Now Arriving. Please stand back from the hatch.
Stand back from the hatch.
Please exit the submarine.
Please exit the submarine in a calm and orderly fashion.
Access to the console is limited to authorized personnel only. Please. Step. Back.
Warning! You are not authorized to use this console. Continued interactions will deem you a liability. Please step back.
This is a friendly reminder that this submarine is outfitted with an Internal Defense System turret. Do not continue to interact with the console.
Unauthorized personnel detected. Please do not interact any further with the console.
You do not have the clearance to interact with this console. Please step back.
Continued attempts at interaction with this console will result in execution. weh sorry.. heh
You lack the permission to use this console. Please step back.
Due to your continued attempts to use this console, you have been deemed a liability. Administering lead.
Since you're unable to follow simple instructions, I have been given permission to terminate you.Goodbye.
It would seem as if you do not have the cognitive function required to do your tasks. Please stand by for execution.

Hello! Under normal circumstances, being in this room would lead to your execution. However, given the current situation, you have been granted an exception and have been placed on a whitelist. Whilst you're free to roam the core, take anything that could aid you, or use it as a safe-room, you do not have permission to tamper with any consoles. Should you try to interact, touch, break or kick any servers or consoles, your whitelist will be revoked, and you will be executed.
Please note: You are being recorded. Smile and wave. :)
Please note: Your time here may be monitored or recorded.
EXR-P personnel spotted at central NAVI control base. Updating breach log.
You've returned. what is it you inquire?
Whitelisted EXR-P detected. Disengaging counter-measures. Hello!
Goodbye.
We at Urbanshade would like to personally thank you for your... *Continued 'cooperation'.*

Congratulations on completing your glider training. You have been chosen to be a part of a select few, who have permission to use the glider tubes for the purpose of maintenance and transportation. I will now be giving you a quick reminder about the safety checklist, which must be followed at all times: Do not turn on the Glider whilst outside of water. Do not drop the Glider. Do not let go of the handlebar whilst in operation. Do not ram the Glider into walls, or other stationary objects. Do not use the Glider to purposefully commit roadkill. Do not take the Glider on joyrides. Do not take the Glider through the de-synchronization tunnels without clearance or further training. Should any of these safety procedures be broken depending on the severity, will result in either a pay-dock, contractual termination, or execution. If you wish for a reminder, ask a designated Glider station operator. Swim safely!
Welcome back 'user'! Thruster speed has been adjusted to your preference.
Do not let go of the handlebars during operation. Thank you!
Have fun!
Hang tight!
Ow.
Impact detected! Salary: Docked.
Heavy impact! Your supervisors have been notified.
Notice. This equipment is expensive. Mishandlement will result in contractual termination.
Notice: This equipment is \~expensive.\~ Mishandlement will result in contractual termination.
Any damage sustainted to Urbanshade equipment will be taken from your salary.
Please do not mishandle Urbanshade equipment.
Danger!!!
Notice! Letting go of the glider is both unsafe for your health and the glider.
Notice! Letting go of the glider is both unsafe for your health and the glider. The glider has been automatically disabled and your supervisors have been notified about your reckless behaviour.

Hello, and welcome to the Jetsuit Evaluation Course. As this is your first time on the course, you will be given a quick tutorial on how to utilize the Jetsuit, soo you aren't just forced out of the nest kicking and screaming. The N.O.S.T Jetsuit is a specialized suit that provides the wearer with a wide range of movement enhancements. Here, your body will be capable of doing things you will never be able to do again. Use this time wisely.
Welcome back to the Jetsuit Evalutation Course. As this isn't your first time, the tutorial will not be repeated. You may use the console on the wall, should you want to listen to it again.

To jump, perform a simple jump as you would normally. The suit will automatically help boost you into the air. You are also able to perform midair jumps by repeating the previous action. You are also able to slide. Sliding can help you clear obstacles, and give you the momentum needed to slide down ramps or clear larger gaps.

Latch onto a monkey bar and use your momentum to swing yourself over great distances. Your suit will automatically help you latch on. Your suit also has a Dash feature. Use your Dash to clear gaps and smash through glass panels. To wall run, jump onto a padded wall. The suit will automatically help you maintain momentum, even around corners. You may jump off walls with the same speed as a ground-based jump, enabling continuous movement from wall to wall, or from wall to platform.

Under normal curcumstances, a firewall is activated to encourage contestants to quickly make their way through the course. However, given your current situation, the firewall will be turned off to help alleviate stress. Good luck.
Congratulations on completing the Jetsuit Evaluation Course. Please deposit your Jetsuit in a storage locker before continuing. Failure to do so will result in termination.

This is a site-wide announcement! I am happy to report that the parasite messing with my systems has been neutralized, and operations are now at an acceptable level. The Internal Defense System, as well as any other previously hijacked systems, will no longer pose a threat to all personnel.

Attention! A Vultus Luminaria has been spotted near the entrance of the Lunar Dock. It would appear that a certain *parasite...* is preventing me from closing the external bulkhead remotely. I apologize.
Attention! A Vultus Luminaria has been spotted near the entrance of the Lunar Dock. The external bulkhead has been closed to prevent it from swimming inside.
Changing conveyer direction.

taunts.text: Since you're unable to follow simple instructions, I have been given permission to terminate you.Goodbye.
It would seem as if you do not have the cognitive function required to do your tasks. Please stand by for execution.
Please note: You are being recorded. Smile and wave. :)
Please note: Your time here may be monitored or recorded.
